WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
 
The project (see zip file) demonstrates a scenario with incorrect result on an initial "Shift-select" user operation.
 
A prerequisite for this to occur is "myDataGrid.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem = true;"
 
The zip file contains all the material.
 
Thank you,
 
Julie
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid: initial Shift-select gives incorrect result
